label.text: Are parts / containers single stacked? (not double-stacked on top of each other)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, parts are doubled on same tier of the rack.
(2) Medium - No, easily remedied, fix within next audit.

label.text: Is FIFO being maintained at this station? (no side-by-side parts or operator dual picking)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, parts are side-by-side on same tier of the rack.
(2) Medium - No, easily remedied, fix within next audit.

label.text: Are parts in the correct container type? (Verify with label)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, Supplier has shipped in cardboard.
(2) Medium - No, the container and label do not match. (Needs to be investigated)

label.text: Does the container packsize match the label packsize?

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, all containers in rack do not match label.
(2) Medium - No, some of the containers in the rack do not match label.

label.text: Are the parts in the correct location?

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, the label station does not match the physical location.
(2) Medium - No, the materials are in the wrong tier.

label.text: Do the GFR (Gravity Flow Racks) have labels on both the production and delivery side?

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, most labels are missing.
(2) Medium - No, some labels are missing or falling off.

label.text: Do the labels reflect the correct and complete information? (correct part number, qty, picture of part, mins/max)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, the information is incorrect.
(2) Medium - No, only the station numbers are incorrect.

label.text: Are the labels uniform and positioned in a standard / visible manner?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Are the empty lanes in the flow rack identified as such from both sides?

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, there are no defined labels for this.
(2) Medium - No, there are some labels for the empty lanes.

label.text: Does the part rack accommodate the maximum line side requirements?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is the condition of the GFR in good standing working order? (clean of debris, no broken parts, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, and there is a safety concern.
(2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is the material on the GFR between the min and max?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Are all the parts easily assessable for the production operator and stock chaser?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Does the rack present material to the operator in a favorable manner? (ergonomic front pitch, height of parts, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is all unnecessary equipment not located on the rack? (non-material related, computer, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, the rack is full of unnecessary items.
(2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is the floor free of both full and empty containers or cardboard?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is all safety equipment free of materials or material related objects? (Fire hose, extinguishers, eye wash stations, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Are all containers returnable?

criteria.criterion: (0) Low - No, the majority is in cardboard.
(2) Medium - No, a few items are in cardboard.

label.text: Is the lineside display or material orientation be optimized? (ex.: weight of parts in relation to which tier it's placed on, one piece flow, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is the GFR (Gravity Flow Rack) within a set of designated footprints marked on the floor?

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Is the lineside footprint of this station minimized? (Or is it possible to shrink the rack without impact to delivery)

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Are all electrical panels, electrical boxes and equipment cage doorways free from blockages by materials.

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.

label.text: Are we introducing any recognizable sources of contamination to the line? (strings, ties, plastic wrap, foam, etc.)

criteria.criterion: (2) Medium - Some. Fixable within next audit.
